verses.verse: And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And there was <S%H1961><s%> a certain <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of Zorah, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6681><s%> of the family <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4940><s%> of the Danites, <S%H1839><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Manoah; <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> was barren, <S%H6135><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the woman, <S%H802><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art barren, <S%H6135><s%> and bearest <S%H3205><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> but thou shalt conceive, <S%H2029><s%> and bear <S%H3205><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore beware, <S%H8104><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> not <S%H408><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink, <S%H7941><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> not <S%H408><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing:

For, <S%H3588><s%> lo, <S%H2009><s%> thou shalt conceive, <S%H2029><s%> and bear <S%H3205><s%> a son; <S%H1121><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> razor <S%H4177><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his head: <S%H7218><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the child <S%H5288><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the womb: <S%H990><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> shall begin <S%H2490><s%> to deliver <S%H3467><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

Then the woman <S%H802><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H559><s%> her husband, <S%H376><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> A man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, and his countenance <S%H4758><s%> was like the countenance <S%H4758><s%> of an angel <S%H4397><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> terrible: <S%H3372><s%> but I asked <S%H7592><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> whence <S%H335><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was, neither <S%H3808><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> he me his name: <S%H8034><s%>

But he said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thou shalt conceive, <S%H2029><s%> and bear <S%H3205><s%> a son; <S%H1121><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> no <S%H408><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink, <S%H7941><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing: for <S%H3588><s%> the child <S%H5288><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the womb <S%H990><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of his death. <S%H4194><s%>

Then Manoah <S%H4495><s%> entreated <S%H6279><s%> <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O <S%H994><s%> my Lord, <S%H136><s%> let the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou didst send <S%H7971><s%> come <S%H935><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> us, and teach <S%H3384><s%> us what <S%H4100><s%> we shall do <S%H6213><s%> unto the child <S%H5288><s%> that shall be born. <S%H3205><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Manoah; <S%H4495><s%> and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> as she <S%H1931><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%> but Manoah <S%H4495><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> was not <S%H369><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> her.

And the woman <S%H802><s%> made haste, <S%H4116><s%> and ran, <S%H7323><s%> and showed <S%H5046><s%> her husband, <S%H376><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> hath appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, that <S%H834><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me the other day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the man, <S%H376><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Art thou <S%H859><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> spakest <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the woman? <S%H802><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am.

And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> let thy words <S%H1697><s%> come to pass. <S%H935><s%> How <S%H4100><s%> shall we order <S%H1961><s%> <S%H4941><s%> the child, <S%H5288><s%> and how shall we do <S%H4639><s%> unto him?

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Manoah, <S%H4495><s%> Of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> let her beware. <S%H8104><s%>

She may not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> thing that <S%H834><s%> cometh <S%H3318><s%> of the vine, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1612><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> let her drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong drink, <S%H7941><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing: all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> her let her observe. <S%H8104><s%>

And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> let us detain <S%H6113><s%> thee, until we shall have made ready <S%H6213><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> <S%H5795><s%> for <S%H6440><s%> thee.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Manoah, <S%H4495><s%> Though <S%H518><s%> thou detain <S%H6113><s%> me, I will not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of thy bread: <S%H3899><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> thou wilt offer <S%H6213><s%> a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> thou must offer <S%H5927><s%> it unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%> For <S%H3588><s%> Manoah <S%H4495><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> What <S%H4310><s%> is thy name, <S%H8034><s%> that when <S%H3588><s%> thy sayings <S%H1697><s%> come to pass <S%H935><s%> we may do thee honor? <S%H3513><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Why <S%H4100><s%> askest <S%H7592><s%> thou thus <S%H2088><s%> after my name, <S%H8034><s%> seeing it <S%H1931><s%> is secret? <S%H6383><s%>

So Manoah <S%H4495><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> <S%H5795><s%> with <S%H854><s%> a meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> a rock <S%H6697><s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the angel did <S%H6213><s%> wondrously; <S%H6381><s%> and Manoah <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> looked on. <S%H7200><s%>

For it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the flame <S%H3851><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> toward heaven <S%H8064><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> that the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> ascended <S%H5927><s%> in the flame <S%H3851><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%> And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> looked on <S%H7200><s%> it, and fell <S%H5307><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

But the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Manoah <S%H4495><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> his wife. <S%H802><s%> Then <S%H227><s%> Manoah <S%H4495><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> We shall surely die, <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> we have seen <S%H7200><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

But his wife <S%H802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, If <S%H3863><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> were pleased <S%H2654><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> us, he would not <S%H3808><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> at our hands, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> would he have showed <S%H7200><s%> us <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, nor <S%H3808><s%> would as at this time <S%H6256><s%> have told <S%H8085><s%> us such things as these. <S%H2063><s%>

And the woman <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H853><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Samson: <S%H8123><s%> and the child <S%H5288><s%> grew, <S%H1431><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him.

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to move <S%H6470><s%> him at times in the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and Eshtaol. <S%H847><s%>
